name: My Hero Academia dj - Hello Song
nutshell: Todoroki Shouto x Bakugou Katsuki

nutshell:
A revised translation of "Deterrence" by Tadanonatsu, to celebrate 3 years of creator-approved translations!
Old Translation: https://mangadex.org/chapter/217628/1
Links:

Creator's Pixiv
Creator's Twitter
Creator's Fanbox

name: Uchi no Obaa-chan ga Motoyan ni Nerawarete imasu!
nutshell:
Jun's latest worry has been the mysterious man that has been frequenting her beloved grandma's small-time candy store. Not only is his body big, he has a sharp stare and he's cloaked in an aura that's enough to send your body temperature plummeting in an instant. Apparently, there's also rumors that he's a legendary delinquent. Could he planning to seize this store?!
…By the way, there's a particular air to the way he's turning his gaze towards my grandma…?!

name: Haikyuu!! - Kyou no Owari ni Arigatou wo. (Doujinshi)
nutshell: After they became lovers, Suga feels too shy to do romantic stuff with Daichi. Not knowing that Suga actually lusts after him, Daichi kindly accepts Suga's quirks. Will Suga be able to tell Daichi his own true feelings? How will Daichi react?

name: The Story of the Thirteenth
nutshell: In this lavishly illustrated–and very short–tale, we follow a mysterious girl through a series of strange landscapes. What is she seeking? What will she do when she finds it? The only way you’ll know for sure is to read … The Tale of the Thirteenth.

name: Dragon Voice
nutshell:
14-year-old Rin Amami is a gifted dancer who has been forced to give up his dream of becoming a singer like his mom because of his deep, frog-like voice. A chance encounter with the idol singing group Beatmen, however, gives him the opportunity to bring his old dream to life.
Despite its oddness, his voice possesses a certain charisma: a captivating power, recognized by some as the legendary 'Dragon Voice.' Rin's destiny becomes intertwined with the Beatmen, Shino, Goh, Toshi, and Yuhgo, as the smalltime idol agency RedShoes attempts to take them to the top!

name: The Strongest Legend
nutshell: Ikewaki Gajirou, nicknamed Gacchan, is the most valorous of the Big 5 in his school. He's a pretty good person. However, he has one flaw that people fear him for…

name: Tsukiattenai Noni Fuufu Yattemasu
nutshell:
"I should only stay as Ryuu's friend."
Amakasu Kiichi is a gay man and it's been 3 years since he started living with his straight best friend, Shibata Ryuunosuke, while raising the latter's niece, Mako together.
Even though he sometimes has trouble balancing childrearing and work, Kiichi still managed to build a family-like relationship. But there is one thing that he's been hiding and that is his yearslong unrequited love for Ryuu.
To make sure that Mako has a happy childhood, Kiichi had planned to keep his feelings hidden forever but one drunken night, he ended up being held by Ryuu!?
This a heartrending story about a painful unrequited love and family bonds.

name: Breakfast Club
nutshell:
Yaoi series of stories about life in a boy's dorm at a high school. The main couple in the first volume is Masamoto and Izuka, who are roommates. Masamoto saves Izuka from prostitution. There is also Hiroki who is sleeping with his teacher, the dorm manager.
Vol. 1 Breakfast Club
Vol. 2 Room Mate
Vol. 3 Bed Time
Vol. 4 Pillow Talk
Vol. 5 Door to Door

name: Adume
nutshell: Noah O'Donnell es un joven de preparatoria con un problema, noche a noche tiene una pesadilla que al día siguiente no recuerda. El vive una vida normal, exceptuando su problema de sueño, hasta que, una mañana, parece recordar lo que soñó… lo que vivió dentro del sueño. Desde ese día nada volvió a ser igual para el joven Noah ni las personas que lo rodean.

name: Mononofu!
nutshell: Born in the wilderness from corpses after a battle, a lonely vengeful spirit is inexplicably compelled to follow a masculine general who is passing by. The vengeful spirit is overflowing with nothing but sorrow and malice, and that night, it appears before the general to curse him to death. However, the benevolence of the general who embraces it pierces its heart, and it wishes to live by his side instead!?

name: The Studio Apartment's Divine Spirits
nutshell: 'Myoryeong' is a fairy who dreams of the Jade Emperor, the ruler of Heaven and Earth. As the humans began to construct apartments, the Spirit of the Mountains, 'Hanho', had suddenly found himself jobless. And to top it off is 'Minwoo,' a lively neighbor as well as a flirt, and 'Nara' an otaku with no social skills. Here comes a fantasy sitcom drama that's about to unfold between these four members!

name: Kaya-chan wa Kowakunai
nutshell: Kaya-chan is an infamous problem child in kindergarten. However, when Chie-sensei is assigned to look after her, she finds out that Kaya has an ability... Presenting to you, the strongest horror action series set in a kindergarten!!

name: Thirteenth Night
nutshell:
The Ran Empire, a country that carries 500 long years of history and the daughter of one of the four major families who aided the emperor at the time of its founding. The daughter who was abandoned as soon as she was born and was raised in the slums.
In front of Salk, who's on the verge of being sold as a concubine to a rotten old man, is a noble young lady. A lady who looks identical to Salk and is claiming to be her twin sister.
Hee-yeon, whose life is in danger, asks her twin sister, Salk, who she met for the first time after 19 years…

With its splendid history of five hundred years, Lan Empire has its own share of lights and shadows. Abandoned at birth, Lynx grows up in one of its slums although she is a daughter of the powerful House of Joo, one of four founding families of the empire from its birth. Just as Lynx is about to be sold off as a concubine to a senile old man, a noble lady appears in front of her. Heeyun Joo, the noble lady with a striking similarity to Lynx, claims to be her long lost older twin sister. With her life being extinguished steadily, Heeyun asks that Lynx, her twin younger sister reunited only after 19 years, pose as her.

Lynx Joo may be the daughter of one of the Empire's founding families, but being abandoned at birth, she is left to grow up in one of its slums. The future of a woman in the slums is bleak at best, so Lynx is ready for an out. She’s about to be sold off to a senile old man when she’s rescued by a noblewoman who looks just like herself. Claiming to be her older twin sister, Heeyun Joo asks her for a startling favor: to pose as her… or else.

Original Webtoon
Official Translations:

English: COPIN, Pocket Comics, NetComics, Tappytoon

name: Ore ni Ochite ne? Suzume-kun
nutshell: “Maybe I’ll have you fall into me, Suzume.” Suzume, a clerk at a cafe, receives a business card from one of his regulars, a handsome businessman by the name of Miyaji. Not only that, but Suzume’s coworker tells him he thinks Miyaji has a thing for him! Not willing to just take being made fun of by a hot guy like that, Suzume decides to fight back…!! The next day, Suzume gets touchy-feely with Miyaji, but that doesn’t change Miyaji’s mature demeanor… or so he thought. At night, when it’s just the two of them at the cafe, a sudden passionate gaze and an intense kiss make Suzume’s hips ache sweetly…

name: Meisоu Senshi Nagata Kabi: Gourmet de GO!
nutshell: Autobiographical essay manga from Nagata Kabi surrounding her struggles with her eating disorder and binge eating.

name: Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica Side Story - Re: Karen (Doujinshi)
Our First Time
nutshell:
A collection of extras for a few of Morishima's earlier Yuri Hime works: "The Conditions For Paradise," "We're Aiming For Love Now," "A Lapis-Lazuli Blue Dream," and "Honey & Mustard."
The first story, "The Conditions for Paradise: Side A," examines Sumi and Sarasa's first time from Sumi's perspective.
"The Conditions for Paradise: Side B" picks up where "Side A" left off, this time from Sarina's perspective.
In "We're Aiming for Love Now: Side A," Lalah has a dream about Shinobu and wakes up to find it is Christmas Eve.
"We're Aiming for Love Now: Side B" continues the story, with more glimpses into Lalah and Shinobu's past together. And Lalah asks Santa for something special this Christmas…
"A Lapis-Lazuli Blue Dream: Side A" tells Sayaka's perspective of her first time with Ruri. (Note: Unlike the other stories in this collection, there is no "Side B.")
"Honey & Mustard: Side A" takes place at the same time as Office Romance chapter 3, and explores the days leading up to the business trip to Sapporo.
"Honey & Mustard: Side B-1" and "Side B-2" tell how Kaori and Mitsuki first met.

name: My Director
nutshell:
Liang Xuan, a gay veteran actor, chases after a shy and innocent newcomer. Then comes in Luo Fei…
Original Webcomic

name: Mitsuteru Yokoyama Short Stories 1960~1962 - The World of Shadows
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Murasame, a banking robbing mobster with two previous convictions, escapes from the police to the home of Dr. Mephisto, a black market scientist who tells him that he will die in a week.
Muraame then uses the time machine invented by Dr. Mephisto to travel forward in time to his own death one week later. What will Muraame do to change his own future?
A collection of 7 masterpieces of SF and detective mysteries!

name: Chunhyang in the Sea (Pre-Serialization)
nutshell:
The main character, a mermaid in the sea, had a peaceful day like no other, but her daily life collapses as her parents are caught in fishing nets by the humans! The protagonist, who has pledged revenge on humans, decides to go get her parents back by going on land…


Original Webtoon <League kakao>

name: Asking For Help At a Shrine
tags: Romance,Comedy,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color

name: The Female Lead Acquires Cheat Skills
nutshell: Cha Jeongyeon, is an F-class Awakened with the lowest grade, earns a living as a dungeon caddy. Up until the day an unknown SS-class monster attacked her in the dungeon she was working in! She miraculously survives the onslaught and gains an out-of-class skill, ‘Eye of Odin’ She begins a new life in this world of dungeons and monsters now that she has an advantage thanks to the skill she learned

name: Nailist and Customer
nutshell:
Artist’s Pixiv
 Artist’s Twitter

name: Belmondo le VisiteuR
nutshell: The story takes places in 17th century, France. Belmondo, a son of a noble father and a deceased witch mother, was born and raised in a cloister's basement. He is the master of an underground prison and has the rights to use any means to bring out confessions from his prisoners, namely by using "torture". With his eye, he is able to see through them… That is, if they do not comply to his questions.

name: Puzzle+
nutshell: I heard a rumor… it's about a black box that contains all the weird and wonderful things in the world. There's nothing that the box can not do. It can grant you any wish in the world. Such a profound, mysterious story. Almost all rumors are basically like this, whether it's true or not is not important. As long as the story is interesting, everything is fine. Thus, the story begins, with a high school boy, a black box, and a mysterious girl.
